Summary: one terned in to three and was gone in two sec or less
divs: Sighting Details my fieance and i went to my best friends funnurel,when i got back i sat on the swing in the back yard looking up talking to the sky to my best friend and out of the blue sky came a obigect of light and it stoped right above the tree line by entergy our power plant that i worked at it started glowing and pulsating and the one ball became three and left as fast as thay arived one went strait up and the other two left at about a 65 degree angle.my girlfriend said she came out side and called me for supper but i did not come.i do not remember her and the door is about 15 to 20 feet away from the swing and i did not go anywere.it seemed like one mineit,but it was dark when i went in side.all i know is ther is nothing that can go that fast it was amazing. i was 21 or 22 at the time.it has realy made me think differantly about aliens and ufo's
trends: There has been one other sighting in Bridge City
There were no other sightings in Bridge City on or around May 11th 1992
